channel.title: MITB Client
channel.description: Hey, so if I wanted to use the MITB client 3.2 or 4.2, which ever one, for a server... how would I stop others from logging in using other clients? Obviously I can't edit the client because it's closed source so I can't add the UID.

item.title: MITB Client
item.dc:creator: @Carter2 Carter_
item.description:
@Carter2 wrote:

Hey, so if I wanted to use the MITB client 3.2 or 4.2, which ever one, for a server… how would I stop others from logging in using other clients? Obviously I can’t edit the client because it’s closed source so I can’t add the UID.

Read full topic
